title: Unable to connect to authentication services
body:
My client was working fine last night but as I got on tonight and attempted to log in, I got an error on the client telling me that I was unable to connect to authentication services.  I installed the hextech repair tool and played with it a bit but no success.  I flushed my DNS multiple times still to no result.  What can I do to fix this?

Edit: its working now

replies.body: You're not alone, NA seems to be having login issue.  We'll be posting updates on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, hang tight!
There are still login issues and your service status page has not been updated.
